snippet: The Waikato Chiefs capitalised on the red card shown to Steve Luatua on the stroke of halftime to record a comfortable 41-26 Super Rugby victory over the Auckland Blues in Hamilton on Friday....

headline.main: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram

lead_paragraph: The Waikato Chiefs capitalised on the red card shown to Steve Luatua on the stroke of halftime to record a comfortable 41-26 Super Rugby victory over the Auckland Blues in Hamilton on Friday.
